mapper.select: SELECT F.FORM_NO, F.FORM_NM, F.FORM_REG_DT, FC.FORM_CLASS_NM FROM FORM f JOIN FORM_CLASSIFICATION fc ON F.FORM_CLASS_NO = FC.FORM_CLASS_NO ORDER BY FORM_NO DESC
SELECT F.FORM_NO, F.FORM_NM, F.FORM_REG_DT, F.TEMPLATE, FC.FORM_CLASS_NM FROM FORM f JOIN FORM_CLASSIFICATION fc ON F.FORM_CLASS_NO = FC.FORM_CLASS_NO WHERE FORM_NO = ${form_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FORM (FORM_NO, FORM_NM, FORM_REG_DT, TEMPLATE, FORM_CLASS_NO) VALUES(FORM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{form_nm}, sysdate, #{template}, #{form_class_no})
mapper.select: SELECT F.FORM_NO, F.FORM_NM, F.FORM_REG_DT, FC.FORM_CLASS_NM FROM FORM f JOIN FORM_CLASSIFICATION fc ON F.FORM_CLASS_NO = FC.FORM_CLASS_NO WHERE LOWER(F.FORM_NM) LIKE LOWER('%'||#{formtitle}||'%') ORDER BY FORM_NO DESC
SELECT FORM_NO, FORM_NM FROM FORM ORDER BY FORM_NO ASC
